dataset.title: LIAS: A Global Information System for Lichenized and Non-Lichenized Ascomycetes in the Catalogue of Life

individualName.surName: Rambold G. (lead editor; for detailed information see http://liaslight.lias.net/About/Impressum.html and http://liasnames.lias.net/About/Impressum.html)

abstract.para: LIAS is a multi-authored information system for the collection and distribution of descriptive and other biodiversity data on lichens and selected groups of non-lichenized ascomycetes. LIAS is a long-term designed project with the final goal to comprise global data â€“ estimates for the total number of lichen species worldwide range between 13.500 and 20.000. As GSD for Lichens LIAS is delivering combined data from LIAS light at http://liaslight.lias.net and LIAS names at http://liasnames.lias.net.

address.deliveryPoint: Harborne Building, The University of Reading

gbif.citation: Species 2000 & ITIS Catalogue of Life: 23rd March 2016, LIAS

sourceDatabase.authorsAndEditors: Rambold G. (lead editor; for detailed information see http://liaslight.lias.net/About/Impressum.html and http://liasnames.lias.net/About/Impressum.html)
